728802f-b.title: Richmond: Douglas Road - Richmond Road
728802f-b.text:
(1)
Douglas Road, west side, about 100 yards aouth of its
junction with Richmond Road, showing the old Judge Emerson Mansion.
May 14, 1932.
P. L. Sperr.
NO REPRODUCTIONS.
(2)
Another view from a different angle.
May 14, 1932.
P. L. Sperr.
NO REPRODUCTIONS.
728802f-b.folder: Douglas Road & Richmond Road, Staten Island, NY
